text: Hi Everyone. My name is Satta and I'm a writer and content strategist based in Boston. I'm a former journalist and previously managed a content studio for an AOL brand. I've been a full-time freelancer since 2014 and do content marketing for agencies and clients in the B2B technology, financial services and healthcare/healthcare IT industries. I love storytelling and bringing this approach to content marketing. I'm happy to be in the group and looking forward to learning from everyone here.

text: Happy Sunday all! My name’s Al and I’m a solutions architect at Coda. While most of my day is spent building solutions and templates on our platform, I’ve started doing more content marketing in the form of blog post, YouTube, and LinkedIn videos to do tutorials of the templates I’m building. I’m a former financial analyst and started blogging about spreadsheets back in 2013 and have seen the power of SEO when writing really targeted blog posts. Looking forward to contributing!
